definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: We can't agree to draw at 30 days D/A.
sentences.chinese: 我們不同意開具30天期的承兌交單匯票。

sentences.english: Low Value shipments including samples should have commercial invoice attached to the shipment.
sentences.chinese: 低值貨物包括樣品應該開具商業發票，並附在貨物上。

sentences.english: I can't write checks without money; that's against the law.
sentences.chinese: 沒有錢的話我不能開具發票，那樣做是違法的。

sentences.english: III Party A shall issue invoices fulfilling with requirements of Party B and other departments.
sentences.chinese: 甲方開具滿足乙方及相關部門要求的發票。

sentences.english: A receipt of the things requisitioned shall be made out.
sentences.chinese: 實施徵用應當開具徵用單據。
請在裝船後給我公司開具發票。

sentences.english: A proforma invoice will be required for the order.
sentences.chinese: 希望貴方能就這次訂貨開具形式發票。

sentences.english: Party A shall provide to Party B the official invoice printed under the authorization of the relevant tax bureau in the PRC .
sentences.chinese: 甲方必須開具印有稅務局監製章的正式發票。

sentences.english: Secondly, before requesting for a Check from your bank, you should place an order.
sentences.chinese: 另外，客戶應先下定單，再從銀行申請開具支票。

sentences.english: As usual, we should require of you an L/C to be issued through a first-rate bank.
sentences.chinese: 和往常一樣，我方要求您在一流銀行開具信用證。

sentences.english: What are the circumstances may issue special invoices for value-added tax?
sentences.chinese: 哪些情形可以開具增值稅專用發票？

sentences.english: Party A shall open a receipt for Party B after collecting down payment for lease.
sentences.chinese: 甲方收取租賃保證金，須向乙方開具收據。

sentences.english: The Buyer should make immediate payment against the presentation of the draft issued by the Seller.
sentences.chinese: 買方應憑賣方開具地即期匯票於見票時立即付款。

sentences.english: The doctor then prescribes a blood transfusion for the patient into the same prescription application.
sentences.chinese: 醫生然後在相同的處方應用程序中開具輸血處方。

sentences.english: As a result, 75 percent of all anti-depressants are prescribed by physicians.
sentences.chinese: 這造成75%的抗抑鬱藥物都是由內科醫師開具的。

sentences.english: If no invoice is issued, the retained quality guarantee deposit shall not be deducted when land VAT is calculated.
sentences.chinese: 未開具發票的，扣留的質保金不得計算扣除。

definition: (international trade) documentation (e.g. a bill of lading)
